description: Casualties mount in the southern Caucasus as France, Russia and the US call for a halt to fighting.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: Armenia 'ready' for ceasefire talks
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: Armenia 'ready' for ceasefire talks - BBC News
maintext: When we arrived, the soldiers were pulling pieces of what they said was an Israeli-built rocket out of the tarmac. All the windows of the nearby buildings had been blown out. Several people had been injured but fortunately no-one killed.
